row.name: $_SetTableDescriptor
row.value: IF Status != ER_OK THEN CurProcedure.InfoPopUp(MessageText = 'Error building application descriptor array.', MessageType = MT_ERROR); ELSE AppDescriptorArray[i].TableArray[j] = TableDescriptorArray[RowNumber]; ENDIF; j = j + 1;
